name: Quilpie Ranch (Portsmouth GameJam 2017)
description:
You are a farmer. You must get your cows from one barn to the other, while making sure they are fully fed. You must walk over each grass tile, without colliding with your train of cows.

Controls = Arrow Keys/WASD

This was a GameJam entry for The University of Portsmouth GameJam (2017). It won the award for "Best Overall Game".

By Joe Shanahan, Louise Hunnisett, Melina Speutz and Oliver Thurston. Title music by James Thurston.
